name: Surrounded (itch)
description:
Description

Surrounded is an attempt to make a Geometry Wars style game in first person. I made it with Unreal Engine 4 using only Blueprint.

Survive for 2 minutes and achieve the highest score you can.

You have 3 bombs. Use them wisely. Bombs do not score points, but they do contribute to your multiplier.

Controls

WASD: Movement
Spacebar: Jump
Left Mouse: Blaster
Right Mouse: Bomb

Known Bugs
  • The high score is not properly saved on level reload.
  • When the timer hits 0:10, it jumps straight down to 0:00.
